attributes.action: Introduce fee for self inflicted medical treatment
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A fee should be introduced for alcohol / Drug / Smoking related treatment by the NHS.

This would result in those responsible for misuse paying for the treatment rather than the more responsible tax payers.

Fees do not need to be large, just £10 - £50 for each treatment would add alarge amount of cash to the NHS budget.
